item.title: AV-Odyssey Bench: Can Your Multimodal LLMs Really Understand Audio-Visual Information?
item.description: AV-Odyssey Bench reveals that current multimodal LLMs struggle with basic audio-visual understanding, prompting the development of a comprehensive benchmark for more effective evaluation.
